thread.title: Watch list for Oct. 17
thread.title_full: Watch list for Oct. 17 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Watch list for Oct. 17
text:
LIVE EVENTS
Horse Racing
• Batavia Downs, 6:35 p.m.
ON TELEVISION
Auto Racing
• Xfinity Kansas Lottery 300, 4 p.m., NBCSN.
Boxing
• Lamont Peterson vs. Felix Diaz Jr., 4 p.m., NBC.
College Football
• Iowa at Northwestern, noon, ABC.
• Mississippi at Memphis, noon, ESPN2.
• Louisville at Florida State, noon, ESPN.
• South Florida at Connecticut, noon, ESPNU.
• West Virginia at Baylor, noon, FOX.
• Western Michigan at Ohio, noon, WNYO.
• New Hampshire at William & Mary, noon, SNY.
• Pittsburgh at Georgia Tech, 12:30 p.m., WNLO.
• Alabama at Texas A&M, 3:30 p.m., CBS.
• Oklahoma at Kansas State, 3:30 p.m., ABC.
• Michigan State at Michigan, 3:30 p.m., ESPN.
• Nebraska at Minnesota, 3:30 p.m., ESPN2.
• Virginia Tech at Miami (Fla.), 3:30 p.m., ESPNU.
• Syracuse at Virginia, 3:30 p.m., YES.
• Villanova at Albany, 3:30 p.m., WNYO, SNY.
• Florida at LSU, 7 p.m., ESPN.
• TCU at Iowa State, 7 p.m., ESPN2.
• Boston College at Clemson, 7 p.m., ESPNU.
• USC at Notre Dame, 7:30 p.m., NBC.
• Penn State at Ohio State, 8 p.m., ABC.
• Arizona State at Utah, 10 p.m., ESPN.
• Oregon at Washington, 10:30 p.m., ESPN2.
• San Diego State at San Jose State, 10:30 p.m., ESPNU.
Golf
• Champions Tour, San Antonio Championship, 2 p.m., Golf.
• PGA Tour, Frys.com Open, 5 p.m., Golf.
MLB
• ALCS Game 2: Toronto at Kansas City, 3:30 p.m., FS1.
• NLCS Game 1: Chicago at N.Y. Mets, 7:30 p.m., TBS.
MMA
• World Series of Fighting 24: Jon Fitch vs. Yushin Okami; Blagoy Ivanov vs. Derrick Mehmen, 8:30 p.m., NBCSN.
NHL
• Toronto at Pittsburgh, 7 p.m., CBC.
• Buffalo at Tampa Bay, 7 p.m., MSG.
• Edmonton at Calgary, 10 p.m., CBC.
Soccer
• English Premier: Tottenham vs. Liverpool, 7:45 a.m., NBCSN.
• English Premier: Watford vs. Arsenal, 12:30 p.m., NBC.
ON RADIO
College Football
• UB at Central Michigan, 1 p.m., 1520.
High School Football
• Lockport at Niagara Falls, 2 p.m., 1340.
MLB
• ALCS Game 2: Toronto at Kansas City (joined in progress), 5:30 p.m., 1520.
• NLCS Game 1: Chicago at N.Y. Mets, 7:30 p.m., 1520.
NHL
• Buffalo at Tampa Bay, 7 p.m., 550.
